  • Description: On Aug 1 a package was discovered during the PM sort with a strong odor, further investigation showed a small leak on the bottom of the package. The package contained UN1263, PAINT RELATED MATERIAL, 3, II The package was placed into a salvage drum and the shipper contacted for disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023080804
item.description:
Report X-2023080804

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080804 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING IN THE LOAD SIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING SHIPPING/HANDLING. PACKAGE SECURED AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT PROCESSING STATION. DescribePack: BOTTLE CAPS BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE PLACED INTO A PLASTIC BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT STATION. 2. X-2023080805 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING/WET IN THE LOAD SIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING SHIPPING/HANDLING. PACKAGE SECURED AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT PROCESSING STATION. DescribePack: CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKABE PLACED INTO A PLASTIC BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT STATION. 3. X-2023080829 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING/WET IN THE LOAD SIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING SHIPPING AND HANDLING. PACKAGE SECURED AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT PROCESSING STATION. DescribePack: CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE PLACED INTO HAZMAT BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT STATION. 4. X-2023080886 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING/WET IN THE LOAD SIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING SHIPPING/HANDLING. PACKAGE SECURED AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT PROCESSING STATION. DescribePack: CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE PLACED INTO A PLASTIC BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT STATION.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING/WET IN THE LOAD SIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING SHIPPING/HANDLING. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA FOR PROCESSING. DescribePack: BOTTLE CAPS OF ALL BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE WAS PLACED INTO PLASTIC BAG TO PREVENT FURTHER LEAKAGE.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: package arrive to truck and notice he could not scan barcode. called a QA to come over to inspect and notice that label was wet. QA manager came over and took pkg to hazmat cage. Notice top was not all of the way on pail. DescribePack: not a big leakage but top is not properly fitted on pail DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: taking to hazmat cage and placed in drum

item.title: Report E-2023080397

Report E-2023080397

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: SAVANNAH
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that 2 of the poly 5 gallon pails of endurastrip (un1760) had been damaged by other freight and had released 10 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023080255
item.description:
Report E-2023080255

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: KENNESAW
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 24, 2023, three (3) 55-gallon drums of sodium chlorite were damaged and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the site. The crew identified the pallet of damaged drums and secured the drums in three (3) 95-gallon overpack drums. HES deployed granular absorbents to the dock floor and worked them in with hand tools. All clean up debris and PPE were contained in one (1) 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2023080208
item.description:
Report E-2023080208

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 20, 2023, three (3) 50-pound bags of UN3378 were punctured by a forklift and released approximately five (5) pounds of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental (HE) to remediate the impacted surfaces. HE personnel collected three (3) damaged bags of UN3378 for disposal. Crews then utilized hand tools to collect the free product. The undamaged freight was re-stacked and secured for normal transport. All UN3378 impacted material was collected and containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2023080202
item.description:
Report E-2023080202

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 20, 2023, one (1) 5-gallon pail of ink was punctured and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental (HE) to remediate the impacted surfaces. HE personnel collected one (1) damaged 5-gallon pail of UN1210 for disposal. Crews then deployed granular absorbent to the impacted dock floor and worked them in utilizing hand tools. All UN1210 was collected and containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report I-2023080020
item.description:
Report I-2023080020

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-30T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: Doraville
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 6 / 30 / 23 at 9 : 43 pm a leaking package caught fire in the load area of the Pleasantdale facility. An employee found the package on a graSng between bays 235 & 236 loading doors. An employee pulled the fire alarm at 9 : 43 pm. signaling for a building evacuation.The package was extinguished by a mechanic and an operations supervisor. 398 employees wore evacuated and no injuries were reported. After 13 minutes the fire was extinguished and the employees reentered the building at 21 : 56.

item.title: Report X-2023070005
item.description:
Report X-2023070005

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-30T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-20
  • City: Chambllee
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Tank car GBRX702039 was found leaking from the BOV by an FRA inspector. Upon inspection by a contractor, the drip was product trapped in the BOV cap and leaked due to a misaligned gasket in the cap. The BOV was inspected, the BOV cap gasket was realigned and the cap was secured.
